title: Expanding Boundaries in Blended and Online Learning: Enhancing Learning Outcomes through Social Network Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Experience with Blended Learning Environments
context.additional_context: Mixed learning design practice and case analysis linked to social studies for elementary school teachers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more intra- and inter-group learning networks within a group using a Social Network Analysis (SNA)-based survey tool
Learners can design and implement simulation/VR-based activities that promote cross-border knowledge sharing in blended learning environments at least twice
Learners identify critical cross-border connection points to enhance learning outcomes and develop instructional strategies reflecting them
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
